content.detailedDescription:
I was home at my parents standing outside when first orb appeared, brought mother and brother outside to confirm after which they became an almoat nightly appearance.
it was the most amazing thing ive ever witnessed glowing and pulsating and even after becoming familiar with them over period of several weeks would move up and down in response to finger movements and at times seem to respond to questions yelled at them. very bright orbs of light like a star but much different they immeaditly caught my eye.
i did not know what to think so i went and got mother to confirm it was really there she stood and watched it for what seemed like 5 minutes saying yes it is therr what is it? i said an orb!
it seemed to hover and move around on a nightly basis for months multiple different orbs appearing and communicating with motion.
i felt at peace and like they were here to protect me and keep me safe.
they would stay out till morning came and dissapear or sometimes float away dissapearing from eyes view. i asked them to bless me with patience and one floated away and came back short while later i felt like i could ask them for anything at all i asked them to bring me a gift and one night a trail of blue glowing lights appeared leading to a hill top i felt so at peace realized i needed nothing so walked back home and then a disc craft flew by. i had taken multiple pictures and videos and even put some on facebook but the government deleted them. i also was subject to heavy amounts of oppression amd harrassment during this time and still am. i emailed the la times and sac bee telling them of this and expecting someone to come out to see this as it happened nearly every night but no one did. i will try to get some more pics next time it happens but eventually the harrassment grew so great i stopped trying to talk about it but in a humorous turn of events my mom would see them and go so have you seen the orbs and i would be like theres one right there and she would go i thought that was one. the department of defense and air force raided my friends father during this time with those names appearing on the discovery with this order social security, air force, d.O.D which i can only attribute to a comment i made on facebook about my friends t-shirt saying cant bust this as we were also under federal investigation for a unrelated reason relating to narcotics distribution on my part atleast and rhen these orbs started appearing every night and i wasnt indicted but then i kinda got the idea the government jus wanted me to go back to the narcotics thing and not talk about the orbs but at this point i feel like telling anyone who wants to hear because of the way ive been treated. i also emailed the muslim people through facebook because they reminded me of the morning star in the quran and i had pictures at the time before they mysteriously dissapeared. they witnessed them and the way they responded to me and actually sent someone to offer there help financially or otherwise and then more stuff happened so just be aware the government is really worried about this report and i was brave enough to share it with you. i believe i can have the . orbs appear if given a weeks time or so as i feel it was a spiritual experience. thank you for your time and sorry the pics and video were deleted and stolen from me.
content.summary: Orbs appeared repeatedly on almost nightly basis for over a year as well as one encounter with a craft that laid a blue trail of glowing blue lights leading up to hill top appearing before my eyes as i walked

content.detailedDescription:
1. on april 21, 2015 at about 8:40pm i went into my backyard to look at the crescent moon and venus in the western sky. then it occurred to me to go to the other side of my backyard to check out the eastern sky.  i have a lot of trees and need to move to get an unobstructed view.

2. from my new position i looked up into the southern sky. i was amazed to see four glowing fuzzy white cylinder/rod shaped objects in the far distance at 60 degrees from the horizon.  the objects were in a stationary/hovering vertical and evenly spaced pattern. as if they were waiting to be observed.

3. i had no idea what these 4 cylindrical objects glowing patchy white could be called.  they were definitely not airplanes.

4. then,as i watched, the top object took off toward the northeast.  the other three objects began to follow the first one extremely fast.  it took maybe 5-8 seconds for all of them to cross the sky from southeast to almost due northeast.  
 
5.  my first reaction was excitement and awe that i was viewing a unique occurrence. i tracked the objects across the sky and as i was doing this i thought "who are you?" in my mind and projected this out to the objects.  i didn't get any kind of response physically or mentally.  but, i felt it would be worth attempting to communicate. 

6. the first object disappeared into the northeast distance. maybe into clouds.  then all three of the other white glowing cylinders disappeared into the same vicinity as the first one.  as if they all had the same exit trajectory point.  when the objects had disappeared i came into my house and immediately called my son at work to tell him about my experience.  he told me about this website for reporting ufo's.
content.summary: Observed 4 cylindrcal stationary white objects in vertical position then on flight path.

content.detailedDescription:
After having my own personal encounters i have found myself constantly in search of answers and needing to find answers and or make some sense of what has been happening to me what i have come across in my searches has been amazing to say the least and i feel it is importanti  for us all to share our experiences no matter the extreme something is going on and it is ever increasing as days pass.
these are just a few of my findings i just wish i were better equipted so i could share them as i have seen them for nowa i have been using my lg cellphone never the less these are the clearest ones i could capture.
thereto happen and s is way too much to ignore disclosure has  to happen now!!!!!!!
much love to all and god bless!!!!!
there are way too many to post
content.summary: Some crazy things i found on ustream realtime  planetarium and midnight planets

content.detailedDescription:
Going north on [address removed/cms/rjl] stopped and looked up to see a frontal boundary cold front moving in from the north. along the leading edge of the dark clouds was a prominent sharply outlined black cigar shaped object moving steadily east along the front line. i watched for a minute or so and could tell there were no fin's, wings or any other protruding parts to this craft. this was a well defined sharp image that was not supposed to be there. i have seen balloons, it was not, blimps, it was not as no under carriage was present. i was usmc and did a lot of guard duty at the end of an airport on el toro california. i know what a a-4, a-6 and phantom jet aircraft are and have flown in small planes locally. this has bothered me for years and i just don't know what it was.
the funny thing was after about a minute it turned north rather quickly and disappeared into the cloud bank. i cant say what it was but i know what it wasn't. too weird for me...
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
As a rotor wing, senior army aviator on active duty, i was flying a cessna 172rg while working on my commercial fixed wing certification with the faa.
took off from ft. riley kansas in ssw direction turning west returning to peterson afb, co. in contact with departure control and flight following with kansas center. turning right to assume a westerly heading and climbing to flight altitude, prior to leveling off a bright light was observed hovering at my altitude to the right front about 20 degrees of my heading. weather was clear and visibility unobstructed. requested traffic update in area from flight following, response, "no reported traffic." estimated distance to object was 1-2 miles. object accelerated vertically 2,000 feet. stopped, hovered 15 seconds then accelerated south 20 degrees to the left of my heading. stopped, hovered 15-25 seconds and then accelerated to the northwest while climbing out of sight. speed estimated at 3,000-9,000 mph during all movement. had ability to instantly stop or begin acceleration from hover at full speed instantly. requested again, update on any reported traffic in my area or on my heading. there was a long silence from kansas center. then, "cessna do you wish to report a ufo." i did not respond, they asked again if i wished to report a ufo. "negative". i immediately switched to an alternate flight following frequency. that is it! it was not of this world or a product of any current or future army or usaf technology. it was real, i saw it. i said nothing to anyone accept my wife about a year later. i was afraid the flight surgeon would ground me. i would have to check my flight log for the exact month and date.
content.summary: Observed ufo while piloting aircraft from ft. riley, ks to peterson afb, co.

content.detailedDescription: At around approx. 8:25pm i was outside my apartment and heard a passenger plane a decided to look around for it. as i looked directly above me to find the plane, i noticed a bright solid white sphere moving in a straight line from west to east with no navigational lights or noise at an altitude of 50,000-70,000 feet and a speed of 400+ mph. i then went into my apartment and got my binoculars which are 7x35 wide at 1000 yards and went back out to view the object by which time had traveled at least 3 miles and now at 55 degrees from horizon from my position. after another 2 miles past the sandia mountains the object dimed and did approximately three to four squiggly lines and then  disappeared out of sight. there was high thin clouds to the northwest but clear skies were the object was and it was brighter than the background stars. there was also a passenger plane in the area at an altitude of 35,000 to 38,000 feet and 10 miles to the left and 1-2 miles behind the object traveling from west southwest to east by northeast. there were no other aircraft besides this one in the area at time of the sighting. only one other witness my girlfriend are known at this time. no news reports in the paper or t.V. have been heard
content.summary: Solid white sphere making no noise moving west to east

content.detailedDescription: Dudjdh
content.summary: Halloween

content.detailedDescription: It was at halloween we all thought it was a lantern bu it wasn't.
content.summary: Halloween

content.detailedDescription:
1) in my backyard sitting facing west towards the ravine behind my house .
2) it was dark (obviously being night) the flew over me, you couldnt miss them.
3) i wondered, what the heck were they, birds, bats? but it was late for birds, bats are black and neither certainly do not glow white or look like flying teardrop ghosts. also birds and bats have wings, these did not.
4) 6 orbs/objects flew northwesterly over me and in and around the top of the trees in the ravine. they flew in a meandering and mingling manner in a group of 2 & 3 then switched positions as if playing and interacting.
5) anyonwe with a window close by in my neighborhood must've heard me exclaim outload "woooowwww". 

i was spell bound, and have been ever since. one part of your brain wants to insist they're birds yet, as previously mentioned, birds have wings, dont glow in the dark, dont have trailing outline nor appear translucent.
6) there were no buds on the trees yet so i could see them for a few seconds but dont know if they disappeared behind higher trees or just vanished.

i have included a three sectioned illustration of their approximate morphology and flight pattern. it's the best image i could find closest to what i observed. 

although they flew, meandered and mingled as smaller birds do, you can see these resemble nothing like birds or bats.
content.summary: Two groups of objects following a meandering "s" pattern in a group of 2 & 3 then switched positions

content.detailedDescription: It was the exact minute of the eclipse wen i was trying to focus on the a eclipse wen i noticed a strange light the looked like a cylinder whirlwind type shape that really stood out in the bright sky. after maybe 30 second it vanished at such speed i couldn't tell which direction it went, at that moment i questioned myself as to what i jus saw but when i checked the photo i took there it was, i felt a little scared to report this but if other people seen it then i wasn't wrong
content.summary: Taking a photo of the recent eclipse. saw a strange light in the sky - it completely vanished but appeared in the photo.

content.detailedDescription: On patrol at chateau nouveau towards the front of the complex heading west. looked above to check blinking wall light when i noticed a bright light flying north. it stops suddenly in its tracks and starts reversing back south. it stops over the two story building in front of me before it drops down very low, 25-35ft above roof tops. i got a good view of the 4 bulbs, 2 on top 2 on bottom. top two same always same color, bottom two always the same color. bottom two spread further apart that the top two. regular  colors, top two yellow, bottom two green, beautiful blue glow. did this with many different combinations really fast. turns green and flys west towards the end of the building.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Most amazing thing i've ever seen

content.detailedDescription:
I traveled from my home to the area near the blue angel crash site on a work assignment. i had been in previous contact with the owner([name removed/cms/rjl],) of the only known video of the actual downing of this aircraft, and was trying to get her to give me an original copy for examination.

when i asked her for a copy, she seemed a bit suspicious, and asked me if i was interested in the ufo, which she had been informed appeared in her video. apparently she had provided a copy to an investigator who contacted her, not long after the crash, which took place on april 21, 2007. she would not reveal to me who this person who contacted her, was, and she would not give me a copy of the footage. however, she asked me to review it on youtube, which i did.

i was afraid that she might not give me a copy of the original file, if i said i saw a ufo in the video, so i told her that i thought it could be a bird or a flock of birds. the truth is, i was a little suspicious of what i saw. i later became more suspicious, which it became apparent that the motion didn't see normal, relative to the background and the moving aircraft. it appeared to move in very fast from the right side of the field of view, and then was stationary, disappearing afterwards. i reasoned that only if a bird or flock of birds were flying directly towards or away from the aircraft would i expect this motion. it did not appear to be another aircraft, given that there's no contrail. could it have been a large cargo plane in the distance? perhaps, as many take off and land in this facility.
still, the motion seemed a bit suspect, as did the illumination. i also became interested in the differences in the mirage effect(doubling of the imagery,) due to the motion of the camera. something could be gleaned from this, regarding the probable distance to this object, also the size of the double, compared to the larger aircraft. i'm not an expert at this but perhaps someone has already studied this in detail to.

i reasoned that whatever the object is, perhaps it moved in front of the pilot, who went down, and that's why he failed to properly tighten his core, or to pull too hard into the curve. i think the pilot may have seen whatever this object was, and was distracted, or tried to avoid hitting it.

i took some photos of the crash site, and while i was there something remarkable happened. i was afraid that i might get run off the site, so i left my car running, while i took photographs of the damage and burned areas, left by the downed aircraft. i hurried back to my car, after perhaps 5 minutes, and found the car locked, with the engine still running. the car is a 2004 nissan sentra, and it won't allow you to lock the door from the outside, when you open the door, with the engine running. the mechanism is designed to keep the driver from locking him/herself out of the vehicle, when the engine is still running. there is no way to override this mechanism, and i've experimented with it numerous times since, and had never had this happen in the previous two years of ownership. it's a fool-proof mechanism, or should be. this vehicle does not lock by itself, ever, moving or not. i still own it, and the only way to lock the car while it’s running, is if you have a second keyless entry. 

note: i did not take the keyless entry off of the chain. it remained in the car. i wasn't worried about leaving it running, because both my wife and i had left the keys in it running countless times, while warming it up in the wintertime. it never locked us out!

my brother in law is a master mechanic for nissan, where i purchased the vehicle, and he said that this should not have happened. he agreed that the mechanism is foolproof, you cannot override it, not by lifting up on the handle when you close the door, either ... nothing will over ride this safety feature, except a second keyless entry.

at first i panicked, because my phone was in the car, and i wasn't near any public phones or places of business. lucky for me, after a few minutes i recalled having stashed a key in a magnetic box, under the vehicle, and i retrieved the spare key, and was able to save myself a lot of trouble.

while this may seem like a small thing, there is much more to this story than i can or want to detail here. i would only that in person, face to face with one of your investigators.

i'm not a ufo enthusiast. i've never seen a ufo, except in other people's movies. however, i've had personal mystical experiences, which could be considered related to the phenomena.

one thing i will say now is that i was sent to this blue angel crash site by my employer, unofficially. i cannot explain that here.

however, consider this .... in just three years, three of nasa's primary american facilities were directly struck by 3 historic tropical systems. 

hurricane katrina - stennis space center 2005 - historic disaster

tropical storm fay - cape canaveral 2008, only single tropical system to ever strike the same state four times in four separate locations. in other words, it made landfall in the same state four times. fay also sat on top of nasa's runways, spinning, while dropping over 20 inches of rain, over a period of three days. given this, watching a several day radar animation, you could even say that it appeared to be a target.

hurricane ike - founder of nasa, namesake storm, made a direct landfall on houston's mission control. that's a little weird, in and of itself. what are the odds that a historic storm of that name would do that? why him, and why there?

no other u.S. military installations have been directly struck like this, in succession, in all of u.S. history that we know of.

perhaps someone is sending us a message?

i'm attaching some footage, relevant snapshots, from ms. richardson film, as well as a scene photo of the crash site, where i experienced the strange vehicle malfunction.

my theory? it's hard to say since i experienced no other phenomena related to the vehicle's performance. all i know is, this phenomena with the car door hasn't happened before or since, and i've owned the car for ten years. in fact, i went out yesterday to see if i could duplicate the malfunction, every way i could, and it would not allow me to lock the door with the vehicle running.

that's it. please feel free to contact me by email or phone. if you don't get a reply, please call my wife at [phone number moved to fi section/cms/tg], and ask her to call you back.

i would prefer not to discuss any additional details via phone or email, but only face to face. this is strictly to protect my professional life.

thanks,

[name and phone removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I visited a blue angel crash site, where i was told by a witness that she filmed the downing, which showed a possible ufo

content.detailedDescription: One of my employees was afraid and said i had to see this. i exited the resturaunt with her. at first i was skeptical as to what i was even seeing.They appeared as more than twenty orange or red globes stationary above table rock mountain to the north slight west of my physical location. it fealt more like i was percieving them than actually seeing them. i watched   for awhile. after roughly ten minutes of observation i just kind of noticed them becoming less and less. at this point i heard what sounded like multiple  fighter jets in bound. klamath falls oregon has a defensive air base so upon hearing jets, i looked to the east where i figured them to come from, and there where 4 fighter jets at full boar. the orbs began dissapaiting quickly. i witnessed this with two or three other employees. i never reported here or anywhere cause i didnt know you could report such things. and i dont really spend a lot of mental effort thinking about ufos. to elaborate on my "encounter." two days after the event i took an order out to an older gentlemen. we small talked a minute and he told me he lived on top of a mountain in eagle point and something hed never seen before happened two days prior above his house. he told me to understand that he flew attack choppers in the military his whole career so he knows the difference between a training exercise and a military action. he disclosed that at around 730p or 800p that this large round orange thing went flying over his roof so fast he barely saw it. then 10 seconds later 3 fully loaded and weaponized attack choppers went over his house so low he could probably almost touch them. they shook a picture off his wall. he said he didnt belive in such things like ufos. but that was a ufo being pursued by the us military. i found it ironic that without saying a word to this stranger about what i had seen he explained the same encounter in the same time frame. this to me was irrefutibly something unnatural. especially to my area
content.summary: One of my employees came inside and was agitated and said i had to go look. there were more than twenty reddish globes above table rock mountain north of my location.

content.detailedDescription:
Was playing video games just had finished watching hockey and i had a friend stopping by he was running late. i made some food and got a message from him around 2. he had stopped and dropped something off for me. after i was done eating i grabbed what he had left and was getting ready for bed. i always look out my window but happened to gaze at the stars was a really clear night. as i turn to head inside i notice a what i had stated was a bright golfball like orb in the sky facing west i grabbed my cell phone compass was 277 west. the object was stationary now i'd like to mention i have seen this object before out my back window (bedroom window) facing south east as well sometime ago and i took pics on my cellphone best i could.

after seeing the object i get a feeling i'm being watched and i believe the greys are in contact with me somehow. as the morning sunset comes up or shortly before the object seems to fade out or disappear like.
content.summary: I normally am awake late at night and on clear night with many stars to the west there is 1 bright light golfball size i grab binoculars and see it's got like windows

content.detailedDescription: Around april of 2012 between 6-7 in the evening, i was in the back yard and happen to look up in the sky when something caught my eye. it looked like it was pulsating and very strange to me as i have over 17 years of aviation experinse. i was very unsure of what the object was, so i quickly ran inside and grabed my camcorder and began recording the object. it seamed to just hover for a while and than began moving from a north west direction to a northern direction. i remember thinking it was very high in the sky because it was well above the hight of some birds that were flying in the sky as can be seen in the video. please note that i did not have a tripod and it was very difficult for me to keep track of the object. i tried to zoom in as best as i could with out distorting the object. after several attempts to zoom and focus on the object, i lost sight of it as it seamed to fade away into the sky and i zoomed away. i remember feeling over whelmed and surprised at what i had just witnessed and seen.
content.summary: Round, white, pulsating, hovering object.

content.detailedDescription:
the first one was during a major thunderstorm approx june 26th/2013. we were in the eye of the storm and the rain had stopped so i decided to take my dog for a walk before the other wall of the eye struck. i saw what i thought was a jet heading west for pearson international airport. it was heading east to west on what i thought was an overly fast landing descent when it changed direction to the north with no curve whatsoever on the turn. proceeded north and then did the same thing again to head east. no curve on the two turns i witnessed. instant direction change and i know of no aircraft that can do that. extremely fast and no sound.

     second sighting was in july/13, clear night and sitting outside and i a saw something with an orange-reddish glow in the shape of a chevron heading north fairly slowly and then stop. at this point, i saw 2 more head from south to north to catch up with the first one. as they got close, the first one didn't wait for them and accelerated so the other 2 fell into formation with him. they cruised in formation for another 2 seconds or so and all 3 hit the gas pedal at the same time. rapid acceleration to infinity leaving 3 streaks.

     i am unclear on the exact dates but the weather reports should provide the windows i've described.

     i had no feelings except awe and there was no sound on the second sighting. the first one, i was in the eye of a storm that possibly masked the sound but the second was a clear, still night and it was silent.
content.summary: 2 sightings, both different. first was very fast with no shape but 2 90 degree turns with no curve on the turns. second was 3 chevrons.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my apartment with my girlfriend, watching some tv shows. a few weeks earlier she saw the same thing i did. i went outside on my balcony, to go smoke a cigarette, i walked outside and before i got a chance to light my cigarette and looked over at something in the sky in the distance at a star or something, then something just appeared over the treeline. 3 lights less then 100ft from the ground,a bright large red light and two small white lights. i stood there in shock at first as i herd a slight hum, however i don't know if it hummed the whole time i saw it because a train drove by and was blowing its horn. the object then the fell slightly and moved smoothly and slowly across the sky towards the north. as it moved the red light on the object pulsate and two blue lights blinked, i tried to get a good look at what i was seeing i leaned over my balcony. it was a smooth black with a kind of black chrome color. i didn't feel scared or fearful of the object, just curious as to what this thing is. my first thought was "that's not a airplane, its too small. it cant be a helicopter or drone it was too quite. is this what my girlfriend was looking at a few nights ago?" by this time i snapped out of my shock and thought to yell for my girlfriend to ask her. i turned to the balcony door and yelled for her. by the time i turned around and my girlfriend was at the door i watched the red light glide to the other side of our building. the whole thing only lasted about 30 to 60 seconds.I have seen strange light before and always been able to explain them away, as planes, reflections or something never in my life have i seen anything like this. i wish i wouldn't have set my phone inside so i could have gotten a picture.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object with pulsing redlight and two flashing white lights

content.detailedDescription:
it was a number of years ago so i can not remember the date exactly (or the month or the year,) sometime between 10-6 years ago, and it was a school weekend with no snow. we have a dog, but for some reason she wasn't there that night, nor were my parents, i cannot recall why. 

  i was laying on the bottom-most floor of our house, (small, common tri-level.) i don't remember what i was doing exactly, just that it was dark with no lights or tv on, only the cable box clock for light. i very vividly remember the next part:
  i was looking up at our ceiling, admiring the swirls of plaster in the dark and i glanced to the clock. it read 11:04. i looked back up to the ceiling, then glanced back to the clock. it read 04:11. 
  i jumped to my feet, instantly in fight-or-flight mode, goose-bumps across my entire body as listened for any sounds. or any sights. i knew something was wrong. 

  i can not understand why, but at that point i decided that i should go to sleep in my room on the top story. i remember that as i went up, everything was oddly "peaceful" and surreal, my footsteps didn't really seem to make any noise, and although there were no lights on, i could clearly see everything. also, it was almost like i had instantly left the adrenaline filled mode i was in, just sorta going-with-it. 

  

  i do not know if the next part happened that same night, but it was some time around then, my parents not home and neither was my dog. in my memory i remember it as the same night, but with the time on the clock, it wouldn't make sense, cause it definitely took place at night, and i had just woken up.  

  i woke up because of a lack of sound. i slept in a noisy room, many clocks and watches constantly making tick-ticks, and when all the sudden they all stopped, it was odd enough to wake me up. nothing made sound though, analog clocks were all still ticking, just no noise. i wasn't tired at all however. i don't know what time it was, jsut that some how i "know" it was night. 
  
  i got the same surreal go-with-it feeling as before, however, i didn't feel like sleeping again so i got up, and then i noticed my window. i have quite the fear of windows at night, so all the blinds in the house are always closed at night. every edge of the window though, it seemed to be "bleeding" in a white-blue light into the house, there weren't rays though, it was like only the walls around the edges of the window were being affected. even so, just like before even though it was completely dark in the house, i could clearly see everything.
  
  i didn't get scared though, it was more a curiosity than anything, but i wasn't allowed to open the blinds, i thought about it, and i just couldn't. i knew there was something above my house, i don't know if it was directly, but i just knew.

  i exited my room and went downstairs at this point. our stairs exit out into the kitchen, where we have 3 digital clocks, one on the oven, one on the microwave, and one on the cable-box that you can see in the downstairs (where i was before).

  i don't know how, but i knew that if i looked at the clocks, i would see something, so i did. at one point i had written down what they said, but i can't remember and have lost the paper, but it was not the time. they all said something that i could clearly identify as a word(s), but i remember not being able to understand it.

  next i noticed that all the windows facing the south (the direction the window on my room faces) had the same blue light bleeding through the edges. 

  we have double glass doors that lead onto our back porch in our kitchen, i some how had managed to not even think of them this entire time, but i then suddenly remembered them, and looked out them.
  
  the same white-blue glowing light was bleeding around the edges of the doors, however, i remember not being able to see out them, it was definitely black and dark out, however, it was also bright. it was so bright that i had to squint, and then looked away.
  
  the only example i can even think of is when it is cloudy outside, yet you still squint your eyes because some light from the sun outside of the visible spectrum still goes through the clouds and hurts your eyes. 

  i don't know how much longer i was awake, i just know i couldn't look outside, that i walked around the downstairs of our house inspecting things, the light was constant and unwavering, and everything was surreal-ly quiet and calm during the entire thing.

  i eventually went back upstairs, but on my way up the stairs i stopped. i reached my arm over to the wall, and dug my fingers into it, and ripped out a bit of plaster. 

  i woke up normally the next day, went to the bathroom, and had almost forgotten about the whole thing, like it was a dream. but i looked over on my way down the stairs, there is still a hunk of plaster missing from that wall.
content.summary: Started with a time skip, then oddities of all clocks, along with light

content.detailedDescription:
I live in windsor, ontario. i was out having a smoke and i always enjoy watching the night sky. i live near an airport and the river. i'm used to seeing planes, boat masts, lights coming from casinos downtown etc. i check to see what unusal stars and such are in the sky, e.G. planets. 

as i was gazing my eye from one side to the other, i came to the moon, which is currently a crescent and so a few stars around it are more visible than usual, which is when i noticed a star like object moving under the moon. it must have been very high in the sky because i saw no body behind the dim light, and it was definitely moving away because it got even dimmer. it must have been travelling at an incredibly high velocity to have travlleled one side of the moon to the other in 3 seconds, especially if it really was as high as i suspected it to be. i'm used to seeing very high flying planes and can identify the light emitting from them; the main light is usually more yellowish (and is only visible when flying towards you), accompanied by other blinking white and red lights. 

this 'object' had no blinking lights, only the main light which was identical to the shine of a star. selfridge angb air force base is about 2 hours from me (it is in detroit, usa) so my initial thoughts was that it could be a fighter jet on a test flight, or some experimnetal air craft. i considered it being a satelite, which would fit the description of it being higher than any aircraft i've seen and it moving in a straight path supports that theory.
content.summary: Simply an unknown aerial phenomenon that cannot be explained.

content.detailedDescription:
1. at an indianapolis indians game with my fiancée. 
2. i recoded a slow motion video of a helicopter nearby hoping to get a nice shot of the rotary blades in slow motion (224 frames per second). looked at video and then noticed the strange dark object move faster than any living creature or man made craft would be able to move.
3. i had no idea what the object was, i thought at first maybe a bird, but the real time version of the video disproved that based on speed.
4. entered top right portion of the screen and crossed the horizon with time sous speed, then cuts right and moves behind the stadium lights helping to determine size which would be at least te size of small plane.
5. i thought to myself after seeing the video over and over again that this is completely abnormal and felt it important enough to report. the copy of the video on my phone is the best quality but i have it on youtube. just search " ufo at indianapolis indians game".
on my phones version you can see the object change direction then move out of frame. i didn't stay on the object because i only noticed it after i reviewed the video.
content.summary: At indianapolis indians baseball game, filmed a helicopter in slow motion, reviewed video and saw it

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping when i woke to a blue light that lit up the bedroom. it seemed to be emanating 
from my living room. i wanted to get up and investigate but seemed not able to move. at first
i felt anxious. i attempted to wake my wife however she remained sleeping. after awhile despi
the my anxiety i slowly slipped into a sleep. this was strange because i felt a presence in the 
apartment. the event was so disturbing the next morning i googled blue lights. this event has never occurred again.
content.summary: Saw a bright blue light entering bedroom but emanating from living room

content.detailedDescription:
On the 12th of 1995, more precisely the 6, 15 am, when i was in my house taking my mate as daily custom, my residence has an area in the back that faces the sea, when suddenly i saw a ball of fire that was falling from the sky, i was for a few seconds to look at what seemed to be on top of my house, but the correct is 80 meters away, just redo scare me decided to go to the site to see what it was, to get close to where he had dropped something space saw that the soil had a hole approximately a 60 cm wide and with a depth of five feet, then started digging and then found a strange stone and it was very hot seemed to be on fire so much that i could not bear a long time and then went back to my house and grabbed a shovel, and facilitated me take this object of the sandy soil. brought to my residence and see that every minute that passed the stone seemed to cool down and take different forms, which caught my attention.

after some time the object is weighed three and a half pounds and a length of 22 centimeters and a width of 13 centimeters. today one can see that this stone changes color, characteristic short tone as the climate, the same it possesses some forms which are as follows: a leaked eye, two ears that seem to be severed, a broad brow and another narrower one small chin, a small hole looking like there had a nose, in order to clarify any object in the form of a rock appears to be the face of a land extra, as these figures have appeared in magazines around the world as the famous aliens. i make this report to be written and recorded in the annals of my life and who i think should know and document

this man was contacted by higher beings, and asked him to put that stone on top of a dune at the beach, but he preferred to save it in a bank
content.summary: Strange stone,  seemed to be on fire, alien face appearance

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was walking in park
2.Its unusual triangular shaped draw my attention
3. at first i thought it was airoplane but its unusual light pattern and abrupt movement have hint that its unusual.
4. when began to move fast,i wanted to still a clip but it was disappeared within. 30-50secs
5. i immediately wanted to confirm its disappearence watching sky from different way towards same direction but couldn't find a trace of same object.
6. there was lady talking on phone who also grabbed a look for 10secs
content.summary: There was triangular shaped 3lights brightened for more than 20secs and abruptly changed its direction to disappear

content.detailedDescription: About 9:15 pm on 4/22/2015 i decided to sit out on back patio to enjoy the beautiful night.  i was sitting facing the west and i could see the moon at about 90 degrees above horizon with a very bright star to the right. to my left was the roof line to the house and there was another fairly bright star to the left maybe at 100 degrees or so from horizon.  i was looking up at about a 180 degrees while seated.  i noticed a plane going in a southerly direction with the standard blinking aircraft lights. as it was going out of sight due to my roofline that is when my eyes caught something directly above.  it was massive in size compared to the plane i had just seen. it was lights in a triangular/v shape moving south to north. the lights were all same size and shape and we're a pale white/yellow light. they did not blink at all either.  they seemed a little brighter around the edges of the circles. there was one at the point and three lights on one side and 2 on the other. i could not see a ship but the lights were evenly spaced and maintained spacing as it moved. there was no sound at all.  we have lots of commercial planes fly over all the time and i grew up near westover afb with c5a's flying over so i am very familiar with aircraft at night.  i have even seen the stealth bomber flyover during air shows at westover and this was no airplane.  i lost sight after i turned to go to door and get my son.  it flew fast but steady as it went in a northerly direction.  as far as distance i could not tell but looked very high.  this is my testimony to the best of my recollection of the event.
content.summary: Triangular/v shaped lights overhead going south to north with no sound and very large in size.

content.detailedDescription: I let the dogs out & looked up to see the stars & i noticed that there was a very odd round pulsating orb in the night sky. it definitely was not a star (seemed quite lower than the stars that were out) it seemed to be changing different colors. it moved very slowly across the sky. i went back out to look at it about an hour after i first saw it & it had moved across into a different part of the sky (desendend a little). went back inside for about 20 minutes & came back out to see it & it was gone.
content.summary: Star-like ufo that had changing colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing at patio window as is usual in the am having coffee; saw glowing green rapidly fluttering bird mimicking the seagulls in a flock flying over meadowland waterway. thought it was shining from somewhere or picking up light. watched and no change; flying amongst the gulls slightly faster and fluttering. birds flew away and up high. i went outside and it came nearer, then looking round in shape, but continuing to fly like a bird. i went inside and looked outside from another room. still there, and flying like a bird again. went outside again and it came nearer still flying in multi directions but looking rounder. continued to flutter alone or amidst seagulls until finally disappearing to the ne. 
a van stopped by the road to watch as it grew lighter outside. nearest type of light is a lazer but checked sky and surroundings and could not see anything or other people besides the person who stopped in the van at the end of the sighting.
content.summary: Green glowing birdlike flying amongst birds, orb when coming closer, fluttered fast, looked like lazer color, mimicked seagulls

content.detailedDescription: I was on my porch in los angeles and noticed a bright orange light in the west skies.  i grabbed my phone to take photos and videos. it was perfectly between two trees in my view. i thought it was the moon but it was too low to be the moon. it had an amber color shadow and started descending and moving north west. it was weird. it looked bloody red, orange and black. it lasted about 4 minutes.
content.summary: Orange light in sky

content.detailedDescription: I don't think this was alien. i saw this v shaped object "fly" over my house and then i lost sight of it. my neighbor has a large tree in the path. there were no lights, no sound. i was watching the meteor shower. i just thought it was cool. most likely a new military thing. it was 1:21am local time. i had my tablet out listening to music. it didn't do anything weird. just went across the sky. i couldn't tell how high or how large. there wasn't anything to compare it to. best guess, about 25ft across, maybe 1000ft high in the sky. my first and last feeling is that it was just cool and most likely military.
content.summary: This was short. i was watching the meteor shower. this v shape went over the house and out of my sight.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my second story balcony to grab a soda and looked up. i see planes every day as i'm in the flight path of the airport and these were not air craft i have seen before. flashing orbs strait across the river over the vancouver wash side. they were moving fast and blinking in and out. i called to my 13yr old who instantly got upset and worried and repeatedly asked me what she was seeing. my neighbor heard us and came out onto her balcony to ask what we were doing so we pointed. she saw them to and then divulged she had seen orange glowing orbs on numerous occasions. this is the second time i have seen these the first i was to shocked and in disbelief to tell anyone. but now my daughter and my neighbor saw what i saw. we saw 4 maybe 5 blinking in and out..One min in a spot across the skyline then the next min it was 100 ft straight up. this light dance went on for about 5 min then they just disappeared. i chased the sky to see if i saw anything else and noticed even higher up a very large perfectly triangular orb pattern not blinking not moving just stationary.My daughter started acting very annoyed so i brought her back inside when i returned clouds had started to gather and there was no sign it had ever happened.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Balcony of 2 story house i see multiple orbs flashing and moving erratically right as i look up.

content.detailedDescription:
I had ufo/et experiences as a child, and i'm a member of a support group for abductees (who i was actually connected to through mufon). i've been sharing my current experiences with them, however i thought it a good idea to report what's been happening here. 

for around six months to a year, i've been seeing a light in front of my house. the last time i saw it was the 19th. i live directly on the coast (overlooking the ocean), and the object hangs out over the sea. at first i thought it was a star, however on a night when it was particularly bright, i realized it was flashing multiple colors--usually white, blue, green, red (or a reddish-orange), and a yellow-orange color. 

after noticing the light quite a few times, i began to pay more attention to it. i realized that if you walked away for a few minutes and came back, you can see that it had moved. it would basically make big circles in the sky--starting at one spot, moving in a large circle, then returning to the same general area as it started.  

initially i tried to rationalize it as a planet or possibly a satellite, but then it dawned on me one evening that this light was visible when it was cloudy--no other stars would be visible, just this light. it's showed up a few rare times in the early evening as well, before it was completely dark out, and you can visibly see it beneath the gray, cloudy sky. whatever it is, it must be in our atmosphere.

within the last four or five months i've noticed it comes closer. now instead of being star size, it's more like aspirin size (using the measurement provided here), and you can see that the "flashing" is caused by it rotating. this has been verified by three other individuals i showed it to--the colored lights seem to be moving from one side to the other, as though spinning. 

the light has recently started to move more as well. you often don't have to walk away to see it progress now. if you watch it long enough, you can see it moving past stars, or the tree-line, or other markers. one night when it was windy, i watched it dip down quickly to the side, then it did an odd squiggly motion moving upwards. a few seconds later, it disappeared in front of me. 

i've taken photos which i will try to submit, as well as a couple videos. unfortunately, the camera i have is only a general digital camera, so i will submit those photos and videos that are the best. in the particular photos and video i'm about to submit, you will see a red-orange light. that's my neighbor's security light on their house, and i left it in as a point of reference.

i've seen this same light two other times in different locations around my town, but otherwise, it is always in front of my house. after telling people about it in my support group, i somehow found out that there seems to be a lot of these strange lights, and no one (meaning u.S., russian, or chinese governments) are claiming them. whether or not this is true, i cannot say, but it would seem these lights are known about. from what i understand, there's a man at a university somewhere who's been studying them. since i've been reporting on them to my support group, two other members of the group have now noticed them too. they also live in the pacific northwest. 

i'm curious if others in my area, or the west and pacific northwest in general, are seeing these lights as well. can anyone elaborate on them?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo often in front of my house
